resources.string:
Welcome to the experiment. Do not press the HOME button for the duration of the experiment.

This is a change detection task. You will see two images presented one after another.
In each image, there will be several colored squares scattered over the entire image.
Sometimes one of the squares will change in color from the 1st image to the 2nd image. Press the YES button if there is such a change, and press the NO button if there is no change. You will receive feedback on whether your judgement is correct or incorrect. Try to be as accurate as possible.
After the feedback, the next trial will start immediately. There will be 100 such trials broken into two blocks. You can take a break after the first block.

Enter your Amazon Turk id below.
Press to go to next block
